00077     void setCigar(std::string pcigar)
00078     {
00079         if (cigar!=nullptr)
00080         {
00081             delete []cigar;
00082             cigar = nullptr;
00083         }
00084 
00085         try
00086         {
00087 
00088             cigar = new char[pcigar.size()+1];
00089 
00090             int lenght=pcigar.copy(cigar,pcigar.size(),0 );
00091             cigar[lenght]='\0';
00092 
00093         }
00094         catch(std::exception alloc_except)
00095         {
00096             std::cerr <<"Failled allocation in setCigar()";
00097             throw;
00098         }
00099     };
00100     std::string getCigar() const
00101     {
00102         std::string returnStr;
00103         if (cigar==nullptr)
00104             returnStr="";
00105         else
00106             returnStr=cigar;
00107         return returnStr;

00240 //Generator specific to uTags (allow to set the name, temporary (hopefully) fix)
00241 template <>
00242 template <class T2>
00243 uTags uGenericNGSChrom<uTags>::generateRandomSite
00244 (const int size_,std::mt19937& engine,const uGenericNGSChrom<T2> &exclList, const int sigma, const std::string ID) const
00245 {
00246     //TODO Sanity check here to make sure it is possible to generate the asked for tag.
00247     uTags returnTag;
00248 
00249     bool found=false;
00250     int size = size_;
00251 
00252     int max = this->getChromSize();
00253 
00254     while (!found)
00255     {
00256         {
00257             uTags temptag;
00258             if (sigma!=0)
00259             {
00260                 std::normal_distribution<float> gaussian(size, sigma);
00261                 size = (int)gaussian(engine);
00262             }
00263 
00264             if (size>=1)
00265             {
00266                 int shift = size/2;
00267                 //Generating our distribution at each call is probably needlesly heavy.. check to optimize this in time.
00268                 std::uniform_int_distribution<int> unif((shift+1), (max-shift));
00269                 int center = unif(engine);
00270                 temptag.setEnd(center+shift);
00271                 temptag.setStart(center-shift);
00272                 if ((exclList.getSubset(temptag.getStart(),temptag.getEnd())).count()==0)
00273                 {
00274                     found=true;
00275                     returnTag=temptag;
00276                     returnTag.setChr(this->getChr());
00277                     returnTag.setName(ID);
00278 
00279                 }
00280             }
00281         }
00282     }
00283 
00284     return returnTag;
00285 }
